content.prompt: Which of the following can be concluded about the status of middle-class people during the late 1800s when the excerpt was produced?

choices.label: They grew to be more financially stable than elites.
They experienced a growth of access to leisure time.
They sought to minimize the influence of consumerism.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
